property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fruitcake Elemental is indestructible. At the end of your turn, Fruitcake Elemental deals 7 damage to you. {3}: Target player gains control of Fruitcake Elemental.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Experiments intended to create the perfect holiday emissary resulted in a substance harder than darksteel and a fraction as merry.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search target opponent's library for four cards with different names and reveal them. That player chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into the player's graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then that player shuffles their library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a creature card from your hand into play under target opponent's control. That creature attacks each turn if able... and always attacks its controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 'Tis better to give than to receive.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Family gathering - Each creature target player controls deals damage equal to its power to another random creature that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Arriving home, he suddenly longed for the bloodsoaked battlefields behind him.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature deals damage to you, put a globe counter on it. {T}, {Q}, {T}, {Q}, {T}: Tap all creatures with globe counters on them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: WARNING: Shake gently. Contents may cause choking, hypothermia, and/or planar invasion.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy another nonland permanent chosen at random, then put a number of +1/+1 counters on Yule Ooze equal to that permanent's converted mana cost. {R}{G}, Eat some food: Regenerate Yule Ooze.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It loves having family for dinner.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Stocking Tiger enters the battlefield with a sealed Magic booster pack under it. When Stocking Tiger deals combat damage to a player, unwrap the booster pack and put it into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just hope yours isn't full of coal golems.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}. Spend this mana only on spells and abilities that put tokens onto the battlefield. Use toys to represent the tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even though Urza tried to apologize, Mishra continued to bear a grudge.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control climbs into Goblin Sleigh Ride. You slide them on their merry way. If the creature stayed on, it deals damage equal to its toughness to each other creature touched during the slide.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What fun it is to ride and sing a slaying song tonight!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you're eating, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. Use food to represent the token. Whenever a creature token you control dies, if it's represented by food, eat it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They all thought her dream was just pie in the sky.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Distribute the sacrificed creature's keyword abilities among any number of other target creatures until end of turn. If it's December, you gain 1 life for each of those keywords.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Now all they needed was a jolly, happy soul.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Bog Humbugs deals combat damage, hum that many notes of a festive song. If you can, put a +1/+1 counter on Bog Humbugs.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Decorated cards in your hand have miracle {S}. (Decorated cards include premiums, promos, and cards with alternate frames or art.) At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control twelve or more decorated permanents, you win the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ask target opponent if they remembered to get you a present. If they say yes, they put a card they own from outside the game into your hand. Otherwise, you gain control of target permanent they control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Dear brother, I couldn't forget you if I tried, and I *have* tried."

property.name: Rules
property.value: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library. Then they may look at the top card of their library and may wrap it. If it's a permanent card, they may put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, they may put it onto the battlefield face down as a 4/4 red Present creature. (To wrap a card, put it inside lots of sleeves. If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a sleeve from it instead.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pitch the titles of up to X holiday-themed sequels to target spell. Copy that spell for each title pitched, except the copy has that name. You may choose new targets for the copies. (Simply adding numbers isn't festive enough.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: NOW SHOWING: *Sword of Hearth and Home Alone*, *Eight Crazy Knights' Charge*, *Holiday Incinerate*, and *Phyrexian Gremlins*.
